name: Redwood Haunting
description:
Overview:

Explore a haunted forest in this 2D microgame that was developed within 10 days for the SCREAMORTALITY game jam. This is the first game I developed and it was created solo. The game itself is very simple and short and can be completed in 5-10 minutes .I really enjoyed putting it together and learned a lot along the way.

Credits

 I solo developed the game and created the art for items/characters/UI/some environmental assets. The rest of the environment art is from purchased/free unity asset packs. The Audio implemented was also from two purchased/free unity asset packs. Two illustrations were created by Jennifer_u. Credit list below:

(Font: 2009 Iconian Fonts - Daniel Zadorozny --Unity Asset Art/Audio packs: Pixel Art Top Down - Basic, Fantasy Environment and Animated Characters, Tiny RPG Forest, Unity Audio Packs: Universal Sound FX, Horror Elements)
